mapper.sql: ID, NO, TICKET_NO, SOURCE, ORDER_NO, RECIPIENT, RECEIVE_AT, DELIVERY_TYPE, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_TIME, REMARK, D_ID, D_NAME, D_CITY, D_AREA, D_POINT, D_TEL, D_CONTACT, D_ADDRESS, R_ID, R_NAME, R_CITY, R_AREA, R_TEL, R_CONTACT, R_ADDRESS, DETAIL_NAME, DETAIL_WEIGHT, DETAIL_SIZE, FEE_TYPE, PAY_TYPE, TRANSPORT_FEE, GOOD_MONEY, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, T_FEE_STATUS, DELIVERY_ID, DELIVERY_NO, CARRIER_ID, CARRIER_NAME, T_FUND_ID, T_FUND_NO, D_PROVINCE, D_COUNTY, R_PROVINCE, R_COUNTY, SCAN_STATUS, SCAN_TEL, V_ID, V_NO, V_DRIVER_ID, V_SCAN_TEL, V_DRIVER_NAME, SIGN_TIME, DETAIL_TYPE, DETAIL_SIZE_LWH, LAT_LNG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
, R_CITY||' '||R_COUNTY||' '||R_ADDRESS as "R_ADDRESS_DETL", D_CITY||' '||D_COUNTY||' '||D_ADDRESS as "D_ADDRESS_DETL", to_char(DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '||DELIVERY_TIME as "deliveryDuration" from MIR.TMS_WAYBILL
order by ${orderByClause}
select , R_CITY||R_COUNTY||R_AREA||R_ADDRESS as "R_ADDRESS_DETL", D_CITY||D_COUNTY||D_AREA||D_ADDRESS as "D_ADDRESS_DETL" from MIR.TMS_WAYBILL where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TMS_WAYBILL_ID.NEXTVAL as id FROM DUAL
